title: Fix navigation menu, remove Projects button, and enhance eagle logo with neon glow animations

requirements.summary: Fix navigation menu section linking by connecting About and Contact buttons to their respective section IDs with smooth scrolling enabled
acceptanceCriteria: About button navigates to #about section with smooth scroll
Contact button navigates to #contact section with smooth scroll
Navigation works on both desktop and mobile views

file_operations.description: Update the navigation links to use correct hash anchors (#about, #contact) and ensure smooth scroll behavior is enabled for section navigation. Verify the scrollHelpers utility is properly invoked for smooth scrolling with offset compensation.

requirements.summary: Verify and ensure all sections have correct unique IDs for proper navigation targeting
acceptanceCriteria: All sections have the specified unique ID attributes
IDs match the navigation menu href targets

file_operations.description: Add or verify the section container has id="about" attribute to enable navigation targeting from the Navbar.
Add or verify the section container has id="contact" attribute to enable navigation targeting from the Navbar.
Add or verify the section container has id="home" attribute to enable navigation targeting from the Navbar.
Add or verify the section container has id="services" attribute to enable navigation targeting from the Navbar.

requirements.summary: Update Navbar component links to use correct hash anchors for all navigation items
acceptanceCriteria: All navigation links use correct hash anchors
Active section highlighting works correctly while scrolling

file_operations.description: Update all navigation menu items (desktop and mobile) to use the correct hash anchors: Home → #home, Services → #services, About → #about, Contact → #contact. Ensure the useActiveSection hook correctly tracks these section IDs for active state highlighting.

requirements.summary: Remove the Projects button completely from desktop navigation, mobile menu, and any routing configuration
acceptanceCriteria: Projects button is not visible in desktop navigation
Projects button is not visible in mobile menu
No Projects-related navigation code remains

file_operations.description: Remove the Projects navigation item from both the desktop navigation menu and the mobile Sheet menu. Remove any associated click handlers, route configurations, or state related to Projects navigation.

requirements.summary: Add electric blue neon glow effect to the eagle logo with soft outer glow and inner light emission that gently pulses continuously
acceptanceCriteria: Eagle logo has electric blue neon glow around outline
Glow pulses smoothly and continuously
Glow is visible on dark or neon backgrounds

file_operations.description: Add electric blue neon glow effect using CSS box-shadow and drop-shadow filters on the eagle logo image. Implement continuous pulse animation using GPU-accelerated CSS keyframes that modulate the glow intensity. Apply filters to create both outer glow and inner light emission effects. Reference the eagle logo image at frontend/public/assets/generated/eagle-head-logo.dim_400x400.png.

Add CSS keyframe animations for the eagle logo neon glow pulse effect. Define animation for continuous smooth pulsing that modulates shadow intensity and blur radius. Use GPU-accelerated properties (transform, opacity, filter) for optimal mobile performance.

requirements.summary: Add smooth light shimmer animation moving across the eagle logo with subtle energy pulse every 3-4 seconds
acceptanceCriteria: Light shimmer sweeps across eagle logo smoothly
Energy pulse occurs every 3-4 seconds
Animation feels futuristic and cyber-tech themed

file_operations.description: Add shimmer overlay element that sweeps across the eagle logo using CSS linear-gradient animation. Implement energy pulse effect with radial gradient that expands from center every 3-4 seconds. Use GPU-accelerated transforms for smooth performance.

Define CSS keyframe animations for light shimmer sweep (translateX movement) and energy pulse (scale and opacity changes). Set animation timing to create 3-4 second intervals with smooth easing functions. Ensure animations are GPU-accelerated using transform and opacity properties.

requirements.summary: Add hover interaction to eagle logo that increases glow intensity, adds smooth 1.05x scale-up effect, and spreads glow softly outward
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering increases glow intensity smoothly
Logo scales to 1.05x on hover
Glow spreads outward with energy activation effect

file_operations.description: Add hover state styles that increase neon glow box-shadow intensity and spread, apply transform: scale(1.05) with smooth transition, and enhance the glow radius to create an energy activation spreading effect. Use CSS transitions for smooth state changes.

requirements.summary: Optimize eagle logo neon glow animations using CSS animations and GPU-accelerated effects for smooth mobile performance
acceptanceCriteria: Animations use GPU-accelerated CSS transforms
No performance lag on mobile devices
No heavy particle effects that impact performance

file_operations.description: Optimize all eagle logo animation keyframes to use GPU-accelerated properties only (transform, opacity, filter). Add will-change hints where appropriate for mobile optimization. Ensure no heavy particle effects or complex calculations in animations.

Review and optimize animation implementation to use CSS-only animations with GPU-accelerated properties. Remove any JavaScript-based animation loops if present. Apply will-change CSS property strategically for mobile performance.

requirements.summary: Implement eagle logo entry animation on page load with smooth fade and scale from 0.85 to normal size with soft upward motion
acceptanceCriteria: Logo fades in smoothly on page load
Logo scales from 0.85 to 1.0
Soft upward motion accompanies the animation

file_operations.description: Replace or enhance the existing sessionStorage-based fade-in animation with a combined entry animation that includes opacity fade (0 to 1), scale transform (0.85 to 1.0), and translateY upward motion. Use CSS animation with appropriate duration and easing for smooth entry effect on initial page load.
Define CSS keyframe animation for eagle logo entry sequence combining opacity, scale, and translateY transforms. Set duration to approximately 1-1.5 seconds with smooth easing curve for premium feel.

requirements.summary: Add neon glow activation effect on eagle logo entry where glow starts dim and gradually powers on within 1-1.5 seconds
acceptanceCriteria: Glow starts dim on logo appearance
Glow powers on smoothly over 1-1.5 seconds
Energy activation spreads from center outward

file_operations.description: Add glow activation animation to the entry sequence where box-shadow and filter effects start with minimal values and animate to full intensity over 1-1.5 seconds. Implement radial spreading effect using animated shadow radius that expands from center outward.

Define CSS keyframe animation for neon glow activation that gradually increases shadow intensity, blur radius, and spread over 1-1.5 seconds. Coordinate timing with the entry animation sequence for cohesive effect.

requirements.summary: Enable continuous soft glow pulse on eagle logo after entry animation completes, pulsing slowly every 3-4 seconds
acceptanceCriteria: Pulse animation starts after entry animation finishes
Pulse occurs every 3-4 seconds
Animation has premium, slow, smooth quality

file_operations.description: Ensure the continuous glow pulse animation (from REQ-5) is configured to begin after the entry animation sequence completes. Use animation-delay or sequential CSS animations to chain the entry animation followed by the infinite pulse loop with 3-4 second cycle timing.

Configure the pulse animation keyframes with slow, premium timing (3-4 second duration) and smooth easing function. Ensure the animation is set to infinite iteration after the one-time entry animation completes.

requirements.summary: Preserve the existing eagle logo shape and only enhance lighting, glow effects, and animation quality
acceptanceCriteria: Eagle logo shape remains unchanged
Only lighting and glow effects are modified
Animation enhancements do not alter core design

file_operations.description: Verify all modifications preserve the existing eagle logo image (frontend/public/assets/generated/eagle-head-logo.dim_400x400.png) without altering its core design. Apply only CSS effects (shadows, filters, transforms) as overlays and animations without changing the source image or its fundamental appearance.
